name: Michelle Ryugu
skill: Restores 2121/2697 HP; increases targets' speed by 30/38% for a limited time.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the turtle rescued by Urashima Taro. She's the type to return any act of compassion, no matter how small. The catch is she's super chill and tends to run behind schedule. Bearing a wish of her own, she joined the beach contest, but the other contestants quickly outpaced her. Nonetheless, many spirits respect her dedication and refusal to give up.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" Event: Clear Chapter 1.
◦ "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" Event: Exchange for 200 Wish Tablet.
◦ "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" Event: Get a Second Half Ranking of 6001-10000.
◦ "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 7501-10000.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the drop rate of Wish Tablet during the "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" event.

skill: "Slow and steady gets the job done!"
summon: "People complain that I move at my own pace, but I still do my best."
limit_break: "I feel like I could move at triple speed!"
